ygData.subject: Re: Spokes of something or other?
ygData.msgSnippet: This is a quest for a wizard final spell and you need 10 pc from all around a world to get it ... Silverion Dragonirder High elf wizard (against all statistics
ygData.messageBody:
This is a quest for a wizard final spell and you need 10 pc from all around
a world to get it


At 13.21 13/09/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: Matthew Musingo <vmjh@...>
>
>Found someone near Halas and he is asking for spokes of a wheel. They
>are named (azua, short and sweet like that) from the sayings of others.
>My question, what do you get if you give all the spokes to him, if even
>anyoen have actually completed the quest.
>
>
>Spellbounder Kapolo L'Arety
>19th season High Elf Enchanter
